榑字的基本解释

榑
fú
〔榑桑〕古同“扶桑”，海外的大桑树，太阳从这里升起（古代神话传说），如“朝发榑榑，日入落棠。”

榑
fù
古书上说的一种树。

榑
bó
〔榑栌〕枓栱。

榑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fú］
［《廣韻》防無切，平虞，奉。］
榑桑。传说中的神木名。

榑字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榑； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页542第24
【唐韻】防無切【集韻】【類篇】馮無切，?音扶。【說文】榑桑，神木，日所出也。【山海經】東望榑木。【淮南子·覽冥訓】朝發榑桑。　又【集韻】符遇切，音附。木名。

榑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
榑字的起名意思

榑桑。传说中的神木名。

榑
Basic explanation of words
榑
fú
[Sang] In ancient times, "Fusang", a large mulberry tree overseas, the sun rises from here (ancient myths and legends), such as "The sun is going to make a dragon, and the sun is falling."
榑
fù
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
榑
bó
〔榑栌〕枓栱.
榑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fú］
["Guangyun" Fang Wuqi, Pingyu, Feng. ]
Mulberry. The legendary name of the sacred tree.
榑
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榑; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 542-24
[Tang Yun] Anti-Wuqie [Jiyun] [Classes] Feng Wuqie,? Yinfu. [Said the text] mulberry, sacred wood, also out of the sun. 【Shanhaijing】Look eastward to quince. [Huainanzi·Lanmingxun] Chaofa mulberry.　[Jiyun] Fu Yuqie, with sound attached. Wooden name.
榑
